section.title: Description
section.para: A component for a tree-like presentation of data. It includes built-in drag and drop support for its child elements.
On the screenshot above there is an example of the tree with expanded node. This node contains its own node with several leaves. Besides, it's possible to choose different icons for tree nodes.

itemizedlist.para: This feature provides rich possibilities to change an appearance of a component to different corresponding modern styles.
This feature allows changing a sequence order of nodes in a tree simply by dragging a certain node from one place to another.

listitem.para: Support of a visual representation for different node types
Support of several root elements in a tree
